issue.title: [C++] Update vcpkg port to arrow 10.0.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18249](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18249). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Please update the [vcpkg](https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg) port of arrow to the newly released version 10.0.0. The current version on vcpkg is 9.0.0.

I found this documentation on how to do it: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Release+Management+Guide#ReleaseManagementGuide-Updatingthevcpkgport

I need this downstream to update the xsimd port on vcpkg, which I need downstream in another project. Thank you!
